page.name: ace/impl-doc/dialogs
page.summary: Almost all aspects of forms/dialogs are automatically captured and documented within ACE. This includes a list of all the forms, any classes that are extended, all fields, field types, labels, conditionals, and many other features.

tr.td: All of the dialogs that are externalized in XML files appear in a single ACE page. Analysts or customers can use this view to review all the dialogs that appear in an application.
Each dialog may be further analyzed by reviewing a user- friendly functional specification view. This view may be shared with analysts or clients to ensure requirements completeness.

Each dialog may be unit tested inside ACE to ensure that user requirements are being met and allowing analysts or end users to start reviewing a running application quickly and without programmers writing test harnesses. As soon as the XML is completed, the test harness is automatically created and may be executed by anyone with access to ACE.
